subject: Re: [junit] Re: Just replaced my 3.7 jar with 3.8
msgSnippet:
When I read the code for the new version, I noticed the following line in the

        Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(
messageBody:
When I read the code for the new version, I noticed the following line in the
ReloadingTestSuiteLoader:

Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader( loader );

I don't know if this is the cause of your problem, but it's worth trying
recompiling the 3.8 without this line and see what happens.

-Vladimir
